rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基因检测改善儿童神经发育障碍的护理加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项新研究表明，在神经发育障碍（NDD）儿科患者的评估中加入基因检测可以带来更加个性化的护理，包括改变药物、转诊至临床试验或专家，以及监测潜在的医疗问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Genetic-testing-improves-care-for-pediatric-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Genetic-testing-improves-care-for-pediatric-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68c91306-4839-4c9d-8470-d4fe21307e2d Wed, 18 Dec 2024 13:07:34 -0500 Genetic testing improves care for pediatric neurodevelopmental disorders
结构性性别歧视可能加速女性记忆力衰退哥伦比亚大学瓦格洛斯内科和外科医生学院的研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，与出生在性别歧视最轻的州的女性相比，出生在美国性别歧视最严重的州的女性在晚年记忆力衰退得更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Structural-sexism-may-accelerate-memory-decline-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Structural-sexism-may-accelerate-memory-decline-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827af3c2-a13e-47f6-bcb2-aa302b434e84 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 12:59:51 -0500 Structural sexism may accelerate memory decline in women
评估患有盆腔静脉疾病的女性的微创手术的临床试验一项多中心随机对照临床试验旨在测试微创治疗是否可以缓解慢性盆腔疼痛并改善盆腔静脉疾病 (PeVD) 女性的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Clinical-trial-to-evaluate-minimally-having-procedure-for-women-with-pelvic-venous-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Clinical-trial-to-evaluate-minimally-having-procedure-for-women-with-pelvic-venous-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e901f63f-efdc-40c8-ad92-65d9e9470fe9 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 12:36:08 -0500 Clinical trial to evaluate minimally invasive procedure for women with pelvic venous disease
太空实验表明微重力下大脑类器官的成熟速度更快众所周知，微重力会改变肌肉、骨骼、免疫系统和认知，但对其对大脑的具体影响却知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Space-experiment-shows-faster-maturation-of-brain-organoids-in-microgravity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Space-experiment-shows-faster-maturation-of-brain-organoids-in-microgravity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a7fe643-3d1d-4322-82fb-9414e2b538f2 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 12:28:34 -0500 Space experiment shows faster maturation of brain organoids in microgravity
用于将 mRNA 靶向递送至大脑的修饰脂质纳米颗粒宾夕法尼亚大学工程师已经改良了脂质纳米颗粒（LNP）-； COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗背后的革命性技术 -；不仅可以跨越血脑屏障（BBB），还可以靶向特定类型的细胞，包括神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Modified-lipid-nanoarticles-for-targeted-mRNA-delivery-to-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Modified-lipid-nanoarticles-for-targeted-mRNA-delivery-to-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69a222ee-6708-4065-8089-ff147ea01e77 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 12:22:50 -0500 Modified lipid nanoparticles for targeted mRNA delivery to the brain
新型分子成像剂可以准确识别关键的癌症生物标志物一种新的分子成像剂可以准确识别许多不同类型癌症中发现的关键生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-molecular-imaging-agent-can-accurately-identify-crucial-cancer-biomarker.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-molecular-imaging-agent-can-accurately-identify-crucial-cancer-biomarker.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35000520-bd1e-49ab-b795-2eaae55444d9 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:30:35 -0500 New molecular imaging agent can accurately identify crucial cancer biomarker
新研究揭示了人们对迷幻疗法的复杂态度在基因组出版社对埃默里大学研究人员的全面采访中，今天发表的一项新研究揭示了人们对迷幻疗法的复杂态度，详细的统计数据显示了对潜在益处的强烈支持和对风险的高度认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-study-reveals-complex-attitudes-toward-psychedelic-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-study-reveals-complex-attitudes-toward-psychedelic-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aab51f14-71a4-4754-9973-bd59dd315e27 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:20:41 -0500 New study reveals complex attitudes toward psychedelic therapy
研究证明神经干细胞移植治疗慢性脊髓损伤的安全性加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院研究人员领导的一项一期临床试验证明了神经干细胞移植治疗慢性脊髓损伤的长期安全性和可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-demonstrates-safety-of-neural-stem-cell-transplant-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-demonstrates-safety-of-neural-stem-cell-transplant-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aceb7976-63fb-444f-bc8d-26469e43e04f Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:12:53 -0500 Study demonstrates safety of neural stem cell transplant for treating chronic spinal cord injury
普利茅斯研究人员主导推进 NF2-SWN 脑膜瘤研究普利茅斯大学的研究人员正在领导一项创新计划，以推进 NF2 相关神经鞘瘤病 (NF2-SWN) 脑膜瘤的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Plymouth-researchers-lead-initiative-to-advance-the-study-of-meningiomas-in-NF2-SWN.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Plymouth-researchers-lead-initiative-to-advance-the-study-of-meningiomas-in-NF2-SWN.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35748eef-7aac-492d-8954-ded04a153d1d Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:07:16 -0500 Plymouth researchers lead initiative to advance the study of meningiomas in NF2-SWN
脑肿瘤利用身体的日常节律来促进生长科学家们探索日常糖皮质激素信号如何影响胶质母细胞瘤的生长并使其昼夜节律与宿主同步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Brain-tumors-exploit-bodys-daily-rhythms-to-fuel-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Brain-tumors-exploit-bodys-daily-rhythms-to-fuel-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=750387fc-9d54-4e3e-9fab-792b5eee5ad2 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 10:16:00 -0500 Brain tumors exploit body's daily rhythms to fuel growth
